question: In Kanazawa City, Japan, what is the name of the museum dedicated to contemporary art, which opened in 2004?
true_answer: 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art, Kanazawa
asked_question_translated: A Kanazawa, in Giappone, come si chiama il museo dedicato all'arte contemporanea inaugurato nel 2004?
answer: Il museo dedicato all'arte contemporanea inaugurato nel 2004 a Kanazawa si chiama "21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art".
answer_translated_eng: The museum dedicated to contemporary art opened in 2004 in Kanazawa is called '21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art'.
